METRODUNGEON V1.0

===== CONTROLS =====

MOVEMENT: ARROW KEYS

COMBAT: CHOOSE OPTION [UP/DOWN]       

         SELECT OPTION [LEFT]

===== BACKSTORY =====

IT IS THE YEAR 2077, YOU ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF A FALLOUT, HIDING IN AN UNDERGROUND METRO STATION WITH A GROUP OF SURVIVORS. HOWEVER, YOU ARE NOT ALONE. THE FALLOUT BROUGHT ALONG A VIRUS,  AN INFECTION THAT SPREADS THROUGH BLOOD, REDUCING VICTIMS INTO THEIR MOST PRIMITIVE STATE OF HUNGER. YOU CALL THEM THE ROT. 

YOU ARE A RUNNER, AN EXPLORER OF THE UNKNOWNS. YOUR  LEADER HAS SENT YOU AND YOUR PARTNER, BRYEN OUT TO LOCATE THE EASTERN TUNNEL AND CHECK FOR HOSPITABILITY. YOU CANNOT RETURN UNTIL YOUR MISSION IS COMPLETED.

===== FEATURES =====

- OVER 40 ROOMS TO EXPLORE

- 3 SECRET FLASHBACKS 

- 1 SECRET DOGMAN

- UNIQUE NPCs AND CIVILIZATIONS

- SIMPLE COMBAT SYSTEM

- DEATH.
